title: Winter is Here, And Free People Has The New Arrivals To Prove It
description: We know our readers love a good Free People find. So do our editors, who are always more than thrilled to keep tabs on the best new products to shop from the retailer. While new releases can be overwhelming, we’re here to bring you the best-of-the-best options worth your attention — and coins.With winter weather in full swing, cue the cozy essentials (think coordinating lounge sets and cute cardigans), luxe statement pieces (slay winter dresses and sparkly jeans, please and thanks), and functional yet stylish accessories (if you’re not swathed in an oversized scarf, what are you doing?) Of course, FP faves like beanies, quilted carryalls, and ultra-soft pajamas — not to mention the highly coveted Free People x Yellowstone collection — are holding their own in our edit. Whether you’re refreshing your festive wardrobe or hunting for gifts with that signature Free People vibe, these new arrivals have you covered.All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.For more can’t-miss shopping stories delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our Most Wanted newsletter.Summer IntroWe know our readers love a good Free People find... as do our editors. We’re always more than happy to keep tabs on the best new Free People products to shop. While new releases can be overwhelming, we’re here to bring you the best-of-the-best options worth your attention and money.And now that summer is officially here, it’s a great time to take a deep dive into your closet to see what you need to re-stock. Do you need a new flowy dress? Maybe a new activewear set? What about a denim jacket for festival season? Free People has fresh styles that fit the bill.You’ll find many products coming from Free People’s fan-favorite collections like FP Movement, We The Free, and Free-est to suit any vibe you’re going for this summer. So without further ado, from clothing to accessories, here are the 15 best things to buy at Free People from its new arrivals section.Foxy Baby Alpaca Pullover Sweater Make spirits bright with this bold red pullover — soft alpaca fabric, a slouchy fit, and raglan sleeves make it cozy for chilly days but festive enough for any holiday soirée.Free People Foxy Baby Alpaca Pullover Sweater, $, available at Free PeopleQuilted Carryall Bag FP Movement's carryall bag is a cult favorite for a reason. Secure this neutral beige hue quickly before its inevitable sell-out.FP Movement Quilted Carryall Bag, $, available at Free PeopleHit The Slopes Fleece JacketThe limit of Free People's Hit The Slopes fleece zip-ups that we must own doesn’t exist. This icy blue hue? A winter must-have.FP Movement Hit The Slopes Fleece Jacket, $, available at Free PeopleEmery Drop-Waist Midi Skirt Give your best Glinda for cocktails in this splendiferous midi.Free People Emery Drop-Waist Midi Skirt, $, available at Free PeopleSolar Sweater SetWhen you look up the definition of cozy cute, this set appears. What, like we'd make something like that up?free-est Solar Sweater Set, $, available at Free PeoplePippa Packable Puffer JacketAnother reader favorite, the Pippa Packable Puffer Jacket in sky blue, is just what you need to brighten up those dreary winter days.FP Movement Pippa Packable Puffer Jacket, $, available at Free PeopleGood Feels Mockneck Midi Behold a do-it-all winter dress — try it layered under a slouchy jacket with tall boots and gleaming gold hoops.free-est Good Feels Mockneck Midi, $, available at Free PeopleMiranda Sweater Pant Set Loungewear, but make it minimal and striking. Pair with sherpa slides at home, leather ballet flats for errands, and heels for drinks.free-est Miranda Sweater Pant Set, $, available at Free PeopleFalke Diamond Pom Beanie This winter pattern on the Free People beanie instantly makes any outfit feel festive, whether you're rocking a workout set or grabbing coffee.Free People Falke Diamond Pom Beanie, $, available at Free PeopleStudio Siren PantsThese rich green wide-leg pants are the ultimate in studio-to-street style — soft, comfy, and way too good for just lounging (and perfect for travel).FP Movement Studio Siren Pants, $, available at Free PeopleJackson Cozy Stripe Socks How can a simple sock transform an outfit? One look at these, and you'll get it — it’s all about the vibes.Free People Jackson Cozy Stripe Socks, $, available at Free PeopleHailee Sweater Set Live your best mocha mousse lounge life in this waffle-knit set.free-est Hailee Sweater Set, $, available at Free PeopleWinter Storm Tunic A perfect curl-up-by-the-fire, stroll-with-hot-cocoa, snuggle-under-a-blanket sweater situation.Free People Winter Storm Tunic, $, available at Free PeopleIn A Bubble Puffer Vest Just like your puffers and fleeces, this padded vest in delicious espresso is essential.FP Movement In A Bubble Puffer Vest, $, available at Free PeopleFlannel Play Date Set There’s idyllic, and then there’s this set — perfect for that holiday week off where time doesn’t exist and PJs are the only uniform.Intimately Flannel Play Date Set, $, available at Free PeopleWin Win Bra We can’t talk best Free People new arrivals without highlighting an FP Movement set. For real, it’s another mocha mousse must-have.FP Movement Win Win Bra, $, available at Free PeopleNever Better 7/8 Length Leggings Like the Carpe Diem Shorts, the matching leggings are another best-seller.FP Movement Never Better 7/8 Length Leggings, $, available at Free PeopleBe My Baby Long-Sleeve Tee The lettuce hems on this long-sleeve tee? A whimsical touch to elevate your go-to, rush-out-the-door outfits.We The Free Be My Baby Long-Sleeve Tee, $, available at Free PeopleSuzy Flocked Denim Jacket Tired of your classic denim jacket? Swap in this flocked velvet version — yum.We The Free Suzy Flocked Denim Jacket, $, available at Free PeopleTennessee Low-Rise Shine Boyfriend Jeans These sparkly jeans nail the anti-try-hard holiday vibe — just as perfect with a fine knit top as they are with a crewneck sweatshirt.We The Free Tennessee Low-Rise Shine Boyfriend Jeans, $, available at Free PeopleParty Crashers Half Slip You say underpinnings, we say a boudoir-inspired mini. Pair with an oversized sweater and glitzy jewels for a siren-esque vibe at your next party.Intimately Party Crashers Half Slip, $, available at Free PeopleStriped Varsity Vibes Shirt This button-down nails varsity vibes with its relaxed silhouette — flawless with jeans (especially styled as an effortless tuck-in moment).We The Free Striped Varsity Vibes Shirt, $, available at Free PeopleMojave Lily Travel Scarf Whether wrapped, slung, or tied on a bag, this printed scarf is the ultimate accent piece.Spell Mojave Lily Travel Scarf, $, available at Free PeopleArchie Cashmere Vest If a black sweater feels boring, default to this vest instead — corporatecore meets stealth wealth in the sleek, sophisticated, and simple way we love.Free People Archie Cashmere Vest, $, available at Free PeopleNight Ranch Vegan Jacket Saddle up in this slick suede jacket. While you’re at it, peruse the other hits from the Free People x Yellowstone collab.We The Free Night Ranch Vegan Jacket, $, available at Free PeopleChiffon Bow Top This top is how you ace the boho resurgence assignment.Free People Chiffon Bow Top, $, available at Free PeopleMarie Dress Did someone say holiday black tie? Bam, crushed it.Louise New York Marie Dress, $, available at Free PeopleAlora CoatIt’s giving Penny Lane but with a cutesy cropped twist.We The Free Alora Coat, $, available at Free PeopleLike what you see? How about some more R29 goodness, right here?16 Free People Spring Items Editors Are Carting UpAnthropologie Spring Dresses, Ranked By ReviewersThe Target X DVF Collab Will Have You Spring-Ready
author: Victoria Montalti
excerpt: Discover the best new arrivals from Free People, including cozy beanies, the must-have quilted carryall, Free People x Yellowstone pieces, stylish pajamas, scarves, and more to keep you winter-ready.

html:
1 of 28


Foxy Baby Alpaca Pullover Sweater

 

Make spirits bright with this bold red pullover — soft alpaca fabric, a slouchy fit, and raglan sleeves make it cozy for chilly days but festive enough for any holiday soirée.

2 of 28


Quilted Carryall Bag

 

FP Movement's carryall bag is a cult favorite for a reason. Secure this neutral beige hue quickly before its inevitable sell-out.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

4 of 28

Emery Drop-Waist Midi Skirt

 

Give your best Glinda for cocktails in this splendiferous midi.

5 of 28

Solar Sweater Set

When you look up the definition of cozy cute, this set appears. What, like we'd make something like that up?

6 of 28

Pippa Packable Puffer Jacket

Another reader favorite, the Pippa Packable Puffer Jacket in sky blue, is just what you need to brighten up those dreary winter days.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

8 of 28

Miranda Sweater Pant Set

 

Loungewear, but make it minimal and striking. Pair with sherpa slides at home, leather ballet flats for errands, and heels for drinks.

9 of 28

Falke Diamond Pom Beanie

 

This winter pattern on the Free People beanie instantly makes any outfit feel festive, whether you're rocking a workout set or grabbing coffee.

10 of 28

Studio Siren Pants

These rich green wide-leg pants are the ultimate in studio-to-street style — soft, comfy, and way too good for just lounging (and perfect for travel).

12 of 28

Hailee Sweater Set 

Live your best mocha mousse lounge life in this waffle-knit set.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

13 of 28

Winter Storm Tunic

 

A perfect curl-up-by-the-fire, stroll-with-hot-cocoa, snuggle-under-a-blanket sweater situation.

14 of 28

In A Bubble Puffer Vest

 

Just like your puffers and fleeces, this padded vest in delicious espresso is essential.

15 of 28

Flannel Play Date Set

 

There’s idyllic, and then there’s this set — perfect for that holiday week off where time doesn’t exist and PJs are the only uniform.

16 of 28

Win Win Bra

 

We can’t talk best Free People new arrivals without highlighting an FP Movement set. For real, it’s another mocha mousse must-have.

17 of 28

Never Better 7/8 Length Leggings 

Like the Carpe Diem Shorts, the matching leggings are another best-seller.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

18 of 28

Be My Baby Long-Sleeve Tee

 

The lettuce hems on this long-sleeve tee? A whimsical touch to elevate your go-to, rush-out-the-door outfits.

19 of 28

Suzy Flocked Denim Jacket 

Tired of your classic denim jacket? Swap in this flocked velvet version — yum.

21 of 28

Party Crashers Half Slip

 

You say underpinnings, we say a boudoir-inspired mini. Pair with an oversized sweater and glitzy jewels for a siren-esque vibe at your next party.

22 of 28

Striped Varsity Vibes Shirt

 

This button-down nails varsity vibes with its relaxed silhouette — flawless with jeans (especially styled as an effortless tuck-in moment).

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

23 of 28

Mojave Lily Travel Scarf

 

Whether wrapped, slung, or tied on a bag, this printed scarf is the ultimate accent piece.

24 of 28

Archie Cashmere Vest 

If a black sweater feels boring, default to this vest instead — corporatecore meets stealth wealth in the sleek, sophisticated, and simple way we love.

25 of 28

Night Ranch Vegan Jacket 

Saddle up in this slick suede jacket. While you’re at it, peruse the other hits from the Free People x Yellowstone collab.

28 of 28

Alora Coat

It’s giving Penny Lane but with a cutesy cropped twist.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT
